snippet: In an attempt to protect pitchers’ arms, many major league managers and coaches are counseling against the use of the once-popular split-finger fastball.
lead_paragraph: In an attempt to protect pitchers’ arms, many major league managers and coaches are counseling against the use of the once-popular split-finger fastball.

headline.main: Split-Finger Fastball, Once Popular, Is Falling Away
headline.print_headline: Split-Finger Fastball, Once Popular, Is Falling Away
headline.seo: Split-Finger Fastball: Use of a Popular Pitch Falls Off the Table
